text: Karan () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Meleuzovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 377 as of 2010. There are 7 streets. == Geography == It is located 3 km from Meleuz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Karan, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
